text: "Who Drinks My Beer When I'm Gone" is a single by Canadian country music group Mercey Brothers. The song debuted at number 36 on the RPM Country Tracks chart on March 17, 1969. It peaked at number 1 on June 9, 1969. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable" !align="left"|Chart (1969) !align="center"|Peak position |- |align="left"|Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|1 |} ==References== Category:1969 singles Category:Mercey Brothers songs Category:RPM Country Tracks number-one singles Category:1969 songs Category:Columbia Records singles Category:Song articles with missing songwriters
